name: @dra2020/fn-layer
description: AWS Lambda function for occaasional full patch runs on map database.

scripts.prezip: npm prune --production && rm -f deploy.zip && rm -rf node_modules/aws-sdk && mkdir nodejs && mv package-lock.json node_modules nodejs
scripts.fullzip: npm run prezip && npm run ziponly && npm run postzip
scripts.awsdeploy: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name dralayer --compatible-runtimes nodejs10.x --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.awsdeploy12: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name dralayer12 --compatible-runtimes nodejs12.x --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.fulldeploy: npm run fullzip && npm run awsdeploy
scripts.fulldeploy12: npm run fullzip && npm run awsdeploy12

author: Terry Crowley
